description:
Selenia and Tomomi remark on their days since their first meeting at Hakureiryo Academy, where they eventually become rivals to see who`s the more diligent and accomplished lady. Meanwhile, the Academy`s water system goes out-of-order, and the school has to use an indoor natural hot spring for the time being--and the servants and uppers are getting a little too cozy.
Source: crunchyroll
